products.name: x REVOLVE Carolina Gown
products.brandedName: Michael Costello x REVOLVE Carolina Gown
products.description: x REVOLVE Carolina Gown x REVOLVE Carolina Gown Self: 70% nylon 30% viscose Contrast: 82% nylon 18% elastane 97% polyester 3% elastane. Made in China. Hand wash. Fully lined. Hidden back zipper with hook and bar closure. Boned bodice with halterneck tie. Satin fabric with side seam slit. MELR-WD1053. MCD1351 U24. A specialist in statement gowns, Michael Costello has dressed the likes of Beyonce, Cardi B, Kim Kardashian, and Lady Gaga. He became a household name in 2010 after appearing on Project Runway, and has since established himself as a designer of sexy show-stoppers. Think draped, jewel-toned fabrics alongside curve-flattering silhouettes with high slits and open backs. Guided by the principle that everyone should feel confident when they dress, Michael Costello is meant to be worn by women of all shapes and sizes. It is the ideal label for those nights that call for something striking and unapologetic to strut, spin, and sashay in.
